main event: A bright silvery object was observed proceeding west at an altitude of 8,000 ft, described as teardrop-shaped and resembling an engine aircraft.
interesting points: The sighting was made in June 1956 but reported in 1960,The object was seen by an 8-year-old boy at the time,The report questioned the object's identification, suggesting it may have been a misinterpretation of an aircraft,The witness described the object as moving at a speed similar to a one-engine aircraft,The sighting fits the characteristics of typical UFO reports.
witness description: a boy who was 8 years old at the time of the sighting
